titles.title: There is no glory in my own wisdom

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is no glory in my own wisdom,
There is no power in my own strength,
There is no might in my own riches,
But I will boast in knowing you.
Chorus:
For You are high and lifted up, glory of the nations!
You are high and lifted up, Lord of all the earth!
You are high and lifted up, Creator, Redeemer;
I will boast in knowing You.
